Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24

Package network.messages.toclient

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivePlayerMessage
    A message to the client containing the object of the active player during the current turn
    AllowedSquaresMessage
    A message containing the list of Square objects where a Builder can perform his actions
    AvailableGodsMessage
    A message to the client containing the Available Gods Message
    BoardMessage
    A message to the client containing a Board object
    BuilderPositionMessage
    A Message to the client containing a list of all builders in the board
    DisconnectClientMessage
    A message to the client sent from the server before disconnecting
    ExceptionMessage
    A message sent to the client when an illegal call to controller is made
    GameStateMessage
    A message to the client containing the actual GameState and the active player
    MatchFoundMessage
    A message to the client sent when a match is found.
    PingToClient
    A ping message to check if the client connection is still alive
    PlayerListMessage
    A message to the client containing the list of Player objects.
    StateErrorMessage<T extends StateIdentifier>
    A message sent to the client when a controller call is legit, but made in the wrong model state
    TurnStateMessage
    A message to the client containing the actual TurnState and the active player
    UpdateDoneMessage
    The last message sent at every group of message sent from the server
